torch 0.1.0
  • Reference

torch

torch from R!

Installation

Before installing you should install libtorch in usr/local/lib/.

devtools::install_github("dfalbel/torch")

Example

Currently this package is only a prrof of concept and you can only create a Torch Tensor from an R object. And then convert back from a torch Tensor to an R object.

library(torch)
x <- array(runif(8), dim = c(2, 2, 2))
y <- tensor(x)
y
#> tensor 
#> (1,.,.) = 
#>   0.1435  0.9343
#>   0.9062  0.1974
#> 
#> (2,.,.) = 
#>   0.2411  0.3242
#>   0.8441  0.5722
#> [ Variable[CPUDoubleType]{2,2,2} ]
identical(x, as.array(y))
#> [1] TRUE
